item.title: OPGEN INC S-1
item.description: OPGEN INC, which is in the Services-Medical Laboratories [8071] industry, SEC S-1 filing on December 01, 2022 had 40142 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: may - 470 instances common - 403 instances stock - 394 instances products - 289 instances offering - 204 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
